s: February 24, 2025 - You can go to brandregistry.amazon.com and use the pending TM serial number and file the mark. The fastest we’ve seen is 2 days. But 5-7 days is the average. We recommend filing for your Trademark as soon as you have a sample on hand with your brand name affixed to it.
